newReview.summarize: Summarize your thoughts in a short sentence

addGameStatus.abandoned-text: Stopped playing and without intention of coming back
addGameStatus.retired-text: Finished with a game that lacks an ending

auth.notAccountYet: Don't have an account yet? Register here
auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Log in here
auth.usernameAlreadyExists: Username already in use, please choose other one

steamSync.title: Synchronization with Steam
steamSync.explanation: With Steam synchronization, you can register the games from your Steam account in Lobby.
steamSync.reminder: Remember that your Steam account must be public for the synchronization to work.
steamSync.message: You are about to sync your Steam library with your Lobby account. All the games you own on Steam will be added to your collection in Lobby.
steamSync.checkBox: Use my Steam avatar as my avatar in Lobby
steamSync.showAccountNotExistsError: The Steam account was not found
steamSync.showPrivateError: The Steam account is private! Go to Account Details and then Privacy on Steam to change it
steamSync.snackBarSuccess: Your Steam library has been successfully synchronized!

noElements.noGames: You haven't added any games to your collection yet. Use the search bar to add your favorite games!
noElements.noLists: You haven't created any list yet!
noElements.noRecentGames: There have been no recent games for a week
